710889f-b.text:
(1)
East 4th Street, north side, west from Ave. D, showing the Carpathian Russian Orthodox Catholic Church of the Holy Trinity at No. 345 and Public School No. 15 at Nos. 327-335. Separating these, is a playground, that according to Bromley's Atlas of 1922 was
occupied by a 3-story Jewish School (Nos. 337-341).
April 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A limited view in an eastward direction and showing mainly the aforementioned Church. The three additional structures shown are
Nos. 347 to 351.
April 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
